Backend 'backend/end'
Backends

Description

This backend terminate request with given error code. Can be useful in 'switch' rules

Configuration

Accepted configuration: 

 {
              class                   = "backend/end",
              return                  = (uint_t)'0'          # return this error code, default 0 (no error)
 }
